long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Stream TV shows, films, and discover the award-winning classics, blockbuster movies and exclusive Originals that set Hulu apart. From dramas like Shōgun to the fancy proposals of The Bachelor, your next obsession is just a click away..
































Extension Picture in Picture Brightness Adjustment and watch via hulu
Enhance your Hulu viewing experience with our Chrome extension! This extension adds useful features to make your streaming smoother and more enjoyable.

Key Features:

Picture in Picture (PiP): Watch Hulu videos in a floating window while multitasking. Simply click the "Picture in Picture" button in the extension popup to enjoy your shows without interrupting your work or browsing.

Brightness Adjustment: Easily adjust the brightness of any webpage to reduce eye strain during late-night streaming. Use the brightness slider in the popup to find the perfect level.

Watch via Hulu: Right-click on any image on the web, and select "Watch via Hulu" to be instantly redirected to Hulu’s homepage. Conveniently access your favorite streaming platform from anywhere!.
